items.sentence: I think Tom and Mary might actually get married.
Is Tom going to get out of prison any time soon?
Is it true that you wanted to live in Australia?
Is there someone you want to invite to my party?
Tom asked Mary what her father did for a living.
Tom said he thought that Mary understood French.
We\'ve been studying French for three years now.
Would you like me to help you with your luggage?
You\'re the one who has to do that, aren\'t you?
You\'re the one who should do that, aren\'t you?
